newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Viad started with buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Viad started with buy.

text.p: -- Salomon Brothers analyst Donald A. Zwyer said he initiated coverage of Viad Corp with a buy rating.
-- He estimates that Viad will have earnings per share of $0.85 in 1996, $1 in 1997 and $1.15 in 1998.

-- "Viad generates strong cash flows from a $1 billion money order float which is reinvested in tax-exempt securities and comprises over half of the travel and leisure payment segment's income," Zwyer said.
-- "The exhibits and conventions business provides a steady, recurring source of revenue as companies seek cost-effective ways to market (products)," he said.
